title: PlayStation's Answer to Xbox Game Pass? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.20.20
description:
Greg is joined by Asa GreenRiver -- https://twitter.com/agreenriver07 -- to talk about PlayStation's Jim Ryan's Game Pass comment, Nintendo going after the Smash Community, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:12 - Housekeeping
Happy PS5 Day, Europe!
Avengers Reactions, Internet Explorers
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:08:12 - IO Interactive is making a 007 Game
00:15:00 - Do you expect the Bond brand to rein in IO's funny side to keep the game more serious? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:19:12 - With the official James Bond twitter saying that this is a wholly original origin story how much of a departure do you think this could end up being from the movies? - Best Friends Q:The 5 Star Man
00:23:15 - Jim Ryan is either lying or tonedeaf, Alessandro Barbosa @ Gamespot
00:31:31 - GTA Online Expansion Teased, Zack Zwiezen @ Kotaku
00:40:00 - No More Politics in Animal Crossing, Patricia Hernandez @ Polygon
00:42:50 -  - Best Friends Q:Sucksandwich
00:47:30 - Happy Birthday, Stadia!
00:51:00 -  Ad  
00:54:40 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:56:26 - This is an option I never would have thought to include but yet here it is. Do you see future games including the same options or is this a luxury that cyberpunk 2077 is giving us? - Frankfurtter
00:59:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Asa GreenRiver from Borderline Entertainment celebrating #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth
